hero.title: Global Deforestation and Forest Fire Monitoring System
hero.subtitle: Advanced platform using NASA satellite data to detect, monitor, and visualize deforestation and forest fire events in real-time on a global scale.

problem.title: The Global Challenge
problem.subtitle: The world's forests face unprecedented threats. We need advanced tools to monitor and respond to these critical environmental challenges.

deforestation.title: Accelerated Deforestation
deforestation.description: Loss of 10 million hectares of forest annually worldwide

fires.title: Forest Fires
fires.description: 75% increase in forest fires over the past two decades

monitoring.title: Lack of Monitoring
monitoring.description: Late detection of critical events due to lack of integrated systems

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.subtitle: A comprehensive platform that combines NASA satellite data with advanced technology to provide real-time monitoring and predictive analysis.

satellite.title: NASA Satellite Data
satellite.description: Direct integration with NASA APIs for data updated every 2 hours

maps.title: Interactive Maps
maps.description: Advanced geospatial visualization with zoom and filtering capabilities

realtime.title: Real Time
realtime.description: Automatic updates following satellite capture cycles

analysis.title: Temporal Analysis
analysis.description: Tracking of deforestation trends and historical patterns

technologies.title: Technologies Used
technologies.subtitle: Modern and robust technology stack to ensure performance, scalability, and reliability.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: A multidisciplinary team of developers, data scientists, and environmental science specialists committed to forest conservation.

ana.description: Specialist in React and Node.js with experience in geospatial applications

carlos.description: Expert in satellite data analysis and pattern detection algorithms

laura.description: PhD in Forest Sciences with 10 years of experience in conservation

miguel.description: Designer specialized in interfaces for scientific and environmental applications

impact.title: Expected Impact
impact.subtitle: Our goal is to democratize access to critical information about the state of the world's forests and facilitate informed decision-making.

researchers.title: For Researchers
researchers.description: Access to updated data for studies in environmental and climate sciences

governments.title: For Governments
governments.description: Tools for environmental protection policies and emergency response

public.title: For the Public
public.description: Awareness about the current state of forests and environmental challenges

cta.title: Join the Global Conservation Mission
cta.subtitle: Explore our platform and discover how technology can help protect the world's forests for future generations.

footer.title: Global Forest Monitoring System
footer.subtitle: Developed for Hackathon 2025 ‚Ä¢ Powered by NASA Satellite Data

sidebar.subtitle: What You See, You Can Save
